description:
沪江英乐：女孩，你本身就很美。滚石杂志评价不知名的歌手却带给整个乐坛希望的 Colbie Caillat 柔情新单《Try》。完美性感的声线带给人们清新脱俗的享受，此次新与参演的女孩在镜头前擦拭掉妆容，卸妆后的女孩面对镜头也露出发自内心的笑容，试着去爱毫无修饰的自己。

【Colbie Caillat柔情新单《Try》】

歌词：

Oooh
Oooh

Put your make-up on
Get your nails done
Curl your hair
Run the extra mile
Keep it slim so they like you, do they like you?

Get your sexy on
Don't be shy, girl
Take it off
This is what you want, to belong, so they like you
Do you like you?

You don't have to try so hard
You don't have to, give it all away
You just have to get up, get up, get up, get up
You don't have to change a single thing

You don't have to try, try, try, try

Do you like you?

You don't have to try, try, try, try
You don't have to try

Oooh
Oooh

You don't have to try so hard
You don't have to, give it all away
You just have to get up, get up, get up, get up
You don't have to change a single thing

You don't have to try, try, try, try
You don't have to try, try, try, try
You don't have to try
You don't have to try

Take your make-up off
Let your hair down
Take a breath
Look into the mirror, at yourself
Don't you like you?
Cause I like you

description:
沪江英乐：Owl City 联手小提琴妹妹 Lindsey Stirling 奇幻新单《Beautiful Times》！超级小清新又动听的一首歌，加之童趣般的奇妙色彩，带我们进入一个少年斯派维的奇异旅行。

【Owl City 奇幻新单《Beautiful Times》】

歌词：

A spark soaring
down through the pouring
rain and restoring life to the lighthouse

A slow motion
wave on the ocean
stirs my emotion up like a rain cloud

When did the sky turn black?
And when will the light come back?

A cab driver turned to skydiver
Then to survivor
Dying to breakdown

A blood brother
Surrogate mother
Hugging each other, crying their eyes out

When did the sky turn black?
And when will the light come back?

I'm ecstatic
like a drug addict
Locked in the attic, strung out and spellbound

I fought all through the night
Oh oh, but I made it alive
The sun's startin' to rise
Oh oh, these are beautiful times

This fight of my life is so hard, so hard, so hard
But I'm gonna survive
Oh oh, these are beautiful times

A bad feeling
burned through the ceiling
Leaving my healing heart with a new scar

A dead fire
Rose and rose higher
Like a vampire up from the graveyard

When did the sky turn black?
And when will the light come back?

We all suffer
But we recover
Just to discover life where we all are

I fought all through the night
Oh oh, but I made it alive
The sun's startin' to rise
Oh oh, these are beautiful times

This fight of my life is so hard, so hard, so hard
But I'm gonna survive
Oh oh, these are beautiful times

This fight of my life is so hard, so hard, so hard
But I'm gonna survive
Oh oh, these are beautiful times

My heart's burning bad
And it's turning black
But I'm learning how to be stronger

And, sincerely,
I love you dearly
Oh, but I'm clearly destined to wander

description:
"Game of Thrones" has announced that parts of the upcoming fifth season will be shot on-location in the province of Sevilla in Spain.《权力的游戏》宣布第五季中，关于多恩的剧情将会在西班牙的塞维利亚省完成拍摄。

Several locations within Sevilla will be used for "Game of Thrones," according to a press release from HBO. They will set the stage for a totally new location in the series, which will include characters Prince Doran Martell (the late Oberyn's brother), Doran's son Trystane, the Sand Snakes (Oberyn's illegitimate daughters) and Myrcella, Cersei's daughter and the sister of the unfortunate King Joffrey. 在HBO的发布会上，制作方表示会在塞维利亚省的多个地方进行拍摄。这对于《权力的游戏》的观众们来说是一个从未出现过的新土地，在这里还会有大家从未见过的新角色Doran Martell亲王、Doran的儿子Trystane、Oberyn的女儿沙蛇和瑟西太后的女儿、乔弗里大帝的妹妹Myrcella。

"Game of Thrones" is expected to return in the spring of 2015 on HBO. 预计《权力的游戏》第五季将会在2015年春季在HBO电视台回归。
